common.view

Class BoardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • common.view.BoardView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdateFields, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BoardView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements IUpdateFields
    Displays the view of the board properly and is serializable.
    Author:
    npanzarino, jasirocki - jdoc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
